content.html: Journalist and former Texas Monthly editor Christopher Hooks @cd_hooks has had his Twitter account restricted after posting this tweet about @elonmusk Elon Musk (the retweet function is disabled for the tweet as well)
content.value: Journalist and former Texas Monthly editor Christopher Hooks @cd_hooks has had his Twitter account restricted after posting this tweet about @elonmusk Elon Musk (the retweet function is disabled for the tweet as well)

name: Here and there, hither and yon

content.html: I think people need to understand that the only way to proceed going forward is to block El*n and share only screenshots. If you're out there rawdogging his replies and QTs where he can see them, he will get your account banned. twitter.com/bybrianbennett…
content.value: I think people need to understand that the only way to proceed going forward is to block El*n and share only screenshots. If you're out there rawdogging his replies and QTs where he can see them, he will get your account banned.
